entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023
